Pre-Game Insights: India have won nine consecutive matches in the World Cup.
India's planning and player selection process has led to sustained excellence in the team.
New Zealand have adapted to different roles within the team, such as Glenn Phillips becoming an all-rounder.
New Zealand's best chance to win will be bowling under lights, as the new ball has moved dramatically in Mumbai after sunset.
Trent Boult and Jasprit Bumrah are expected to be key players for their respective teams.
The toss will not be the deciding factor in the semi-final according to Rohit Sharma.
